http://ohi-science.org/data-science-training/collaborating.html
New repository created by partner 1, 
Create branch gh-pages (automatically a website), make it the default branch, then delete the 'master' branch so there is only one and it is the website one.
Clone to his/her desktop using RStudio.
On Github, set up Partner 2 as a new collaborator (settings - collaborators)
